inventory=[{"type": "structure_void", "quantity": 51, "index": 16}, {"type": "command_block", "quantity": 55, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 3, "index": 20}, {"type": "dragon_head", "quantity": 43, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_diorite", "quantity": 42, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a dark prismarine slab, I need to place 3 dark prismarine side by side in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the first dark prismarine to slot 1.
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: To craft a dark prismarine slab, I need to place 3 dark prismarine side by side in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the third dark prismarine to slot 3. Now that I have crafted the dark prismarine slab, I will move it to slot 11.
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
